item.title: 糟糕的股市对机器人有利，对选股人不利
item.description:
在股票牛市中，主动型基金经理很难战胜被动型基金。但这并不意味着目前的震荡很容易被选中。【原文：

It’s hard for active managers to beat passive funds in an equity bull market. But that doesn’t mean the current gyrations offer easy pickings.

】

item.title: 印尼盾跌至历史最低点，关税紧张局势加剧
item.description: 印尼盾兑美元汇率跌至历史最低点，原因是市场参与者对全球贸易摩擦加剧的影响进行了定价。【原文：Indonesia’s rupiah fell to its lowest in history against the dollar as market participants priced in the impact of rising trade frictions around the globe.】

item.title: 橡树资本将香港商业大厦推向市场
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）从房地产投资商凯龙集团（Kailong Group）手中接过香港湾仔区一栋商业大楼的所有权后，正在为这栋大楼寻找买家。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management is looking for a buyer for a commercial building in Hong Kong’s Wan Chai district, after taking ownership of the property from real estate investor Kailong Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本长期债券暴跌，波动性削弱了人们的胃口
item.description: 由于市场波动加剧促使投资者减少对收益率波动的投资，日本长期国债大幅下跌。【原文：Japan’s long-dated government bonds plunged as elevated market volatility prompted investors to trim their exposure to fluctuating yields.】

item.title: 美联储暂缓对 2025 年的展望促使 PineBridge 建立现金堆
item.description: PineBridge 投资公司（PineBridge Investments）看好现金而非国债，因为他们押注美联储今年将继续按兵不动，而全球贸易战将加剧物价压力。【原文：PineBridge Investments is favoring cash over Treasuries on bets that the Federal Reserve will stay on hold this year as the global trade war stokes price pressures.】

item.title: 印度央行有望降息，投资者看好印度银行股
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 特朗普称承诺已久的药品关税很快就会出台
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他承诺已久的对药品征收关税的计划将很快实施，这是一个最新的信号，表明尽管他的全球征税政策对市场造成了影响，但他仍计划继续推进更多的行业关税。【原文：President Donald Trump said his long-promised tariffs on pharmaceutical drugs will be coming soon, the latest signal that he plans to press ahead with more sectoral tariffs despite market fallout from his global levies.】

item.title: 长江和记股价抹去巴拿马港口交易以来的所有涨幅
item.description: 长江和记实业控股有限公司（CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.）股价周三扩大跌幅，抹去了自该公司上月同意将巴拿马运河港口资产出售给贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.）牵头的财团以来的所有涨幅。【原文：CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd. shares extended declines on Wednesday, erasing all their gains since the company agreed to sell its Panama Canal port assets to a BlackRock Inc.-led consortium last month.】

item.title: 关税带来下行风险，新西兰央行认为还有进一步削减的空间
item.description: 新西兰央行连续第五次降息，并表示由于美国关税给经济增长和通胀带来下行风险，央行有进一步降息的空间。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank cut interest rates for a fifth straight meeting and said it has scope for further reductions as US tariffs create downside risks for economic growth and inflation.】

item.title: 日本派遣高级官员赴美为关税谈判做准备
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的政府官员透露，日本已派遣两名高级政府官员前往美国，为高层代表即将举行的关税谈判奠定基础。【原文：Japan has sent two senior government officials to the US to lay the groundwork for upcoming tariff negotiations by top representatives, according to two government officials familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本央行上田在评估关税影响时持观望态度
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，在等待美国关税问题更加明朗化的同时，他将对决策采取观望态度，并承诺继续适当地执行政策。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda signaled he’s taking a wait-and-see approach to policymaking as he awaits more clarity on US tariffs, while pledging to continue to conduct policy appropriately.】

item.title: Meta 举报人将向国会举报公司在人工智能竞赛中协助中国
item.description: 从 Meta Platforms 公司高管变身举报人的莎拉-怀恩-威廉姆斯（Sarah Wynn-Williams）计划在国会作证，称这家社交媒体巨头在威胁美国利益的同时，还向中国示好。【原文：Sarah Wynn-Williams, a Meta Platforms Inc. executive turned whistleblower, plans to testify before Congress that the social media giant threatened US interests while cozying up to China — claims the company said are false.】

item.title: 美国提高小包裹收费，矛头直指中国零售商
item.description: 中美贸易战不断升级，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）进一步提高了迄今为止免税的小包裹的关税。【原文：The escalating trade war between the US and China saw President Donald Trump raise tariffs even further on small parcels that were until now exempt from taxes.】

item.title: 特朗普挑起贸易战，中国股市重现跌势
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统承诺推进更大规模的关税之后，中国与美国的贸易战进一步恶化，中国股市下跌。【原文：Chinese stocks declined as the country’s trade war with the US worsened, after President Donald Trump promised to push ahead with even bigger tariffs.】

item.title: 贸易战引发人民币汇率下跌，中国汇率连续第五天走弱
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）不断升级的关税威胁导致人民币在离岸交易中跌至历史新低之后，中国央行再次发出了容忍人民币疲软的信号。【原文：China’s central bank signaled its tolerance for yuan weakness yet again, after the currency sank to a record low in offshore trading amid escalating tariff threats from President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 马来西亚央行在关税问题上将目光投向关键利率之外
item.description: 马来西亚央行正在寻求超越货币政策的办法来抵御美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收关税所带来的影响，并认为马来西亚在关税争端中处于有利地位。【原文：Malaysia’s central bank is looking beyond monetary policy to weather the fallout from US President Donald Trump’s duties, arguing that the country is entering the tariff disputes from a position of strength.】

item.title: 猕猴桃跌破 55 美分，创五年新低，因关税而忧心忡忡
item.description: 新西兰元跌破了 55 美分的关键水平，原因是人们担心贸易战的深化将打击全球经济增长，风险资产扩大了抛售范围。【原文：New Zealand’s dollar dropped below the key level of 55 US cents as risk assets extended a selloff amid concerns a deepening trade war will hit global growth.】

item.title: 宏观基金看好澳元，期权需求强劲
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Bank Plc）称，澳元本月可能大幅走低，但一些宏观对冲基金在外汇期权市场上看涨澳元。【原文：The Australian dollar may have plunged lower this month, but some macro hedge funds are taking a bullish view on the currency in the foreign exchange option market, according to Barclays Bank Plc.】

item.title: 韩国 Kospi 指数自七月峰值以来跌幅超过 20
item.description: 由于投资者准备迎接美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的大范围互惠关税生效，韩国股票基准指数下跌，延续了此前的低迷走势，目前该指数已步入熊市。【原文：South Korea’s equity benchmark dropped, extending a slump that has now put the gauge on course for a bear market, as investors prepare for US President Donald Trump’s wide-ranging reciprocal tariffs to take effect.】

item.title: 中国铜冶炼企业对中国政府限制使用美国原材料感到遗憾
item.description: 中国政府对美国惩罚性关税的回应可能会给已经在努力应对原材料短缺和利润骤降的中国铜冶炼企业带来另一个头痛问题。【原文：Beijing’s response to punitive US tariffs could create yet another headache for Chinese copper smelters, already grappling with a shortage of raw materials and plummeting profits.】

item.title: 韩元跌至 2009 年以来最低，亚洲货币下跌
item.description: 在亚洲贸易敏感货币普遍下跌的背景下，韩元跌至全球金融危机以来的最低点。【原文：The Korean won declined to its lowest since the global financial crisis amid a broad decline in Asia’s trade-sensitive currencies.】

item.title: 贸易战深化，中国推动黄金 ETF 流入创纪录
item.description: 在全球最大经济体的贸易战言论震撼全球市场之际，中国投资者上周向黄金支持的交易所交易基金注入了创纪录数量的现金。【原文：Chinese investors funneled a record amount of cash into gold-backed exchange-traded funds last week, drawn by the safety of the asset as combative trade war rhetoric from the world’s biggest economies shakes global markets.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）工作人员签字，米莱接近向阿根廷提供 200 亿美元贷款
item.description: 阿根廷与国际货币基金组织（IMF）工作人员达成协议，这是该机构正式投票决定为这个危机频发的国家提供 200 亿美元新协议前的重要一步。【原文：Argentina reached an agreement with International Monetary Fund staff, a major step before the lender officially votes on a new $20 billion deal for the crisis-prone nation.】

item.title: 亚行称美国关税将对亚洲经济产生重大影响
item.description: 亚洲开发银行将进一步下调对亚洲经济增长的预测，因为该地区受美国关税的打击最为严重。【原文：The Asian Development Bank will lower its growth forecast for Asia further after the region was hit the hardest by tariffs from the US.】

item.title: 康卡斯特将在英国推进环球主题公园项目
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp.）表示，在获得英国政府的必要批准后，该公司将继续计划在英国建造其首个欧洲主题公园。【原文：Comcast Corp. said it will proceed with plans to build its first European theme park in the UK after getting necessary approvals from the government there.】

item.title: 韩国为受关税影响的汽车行业提供 20 亿美元援助
item.description: 韩国为其汽车工业推出了价值 3 万亿韩元（20 亿美元）的一揽子紧急资金，以减轻美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税打击。【原文：South Korea unveiled a package of emergency funding worth 3 trillion won ($2 billion) for its automobile industry to soften the blow from US President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 国债收益率飙升引发对下一次大规模基础交易平仓的担忧
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战冲击金融市场，一个令人不安的事态发展正在开始显现：美国国债非但没有提供避风港，反而突然失去了避风港的吸引力。【原文：An unnerving development is starting to unfold as President Donald Trump’s trade war hammers financial markets: US Treasuries, far from offering shelter from the turmoil, are suddenly losing their haven appeal.】

item.title: 研究发现：英国最贫困人口从公共服务中获益 1.6 万英镑
item.description: 根据决议基金会（Resolution Foundation）的分析，最贫困的英国人从公共服务中获得的 "实物福利 "比最富有的人多出 53%，但他们对所获得的福利却不太满意。【原文：The poorest Britons receive 53% more “benefits-in-kind” from public services than the wealthiest but are less satisfied with what they get, according to analysis by the Resolution Foundation.】

item.title: 新关税威胁需求，石油进一步跌破 60 美元
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将对许多中国商品征收104%的惩罚性关税后，石油在周三的早盘交易中进一步跌破60美元，贸易战愈演愈烈，有可能打击全球能源需求。【原文：Oil slid deeper below $60 in early trade on Wednesday, after US President Donald Trump said he would push forward with punitive 104% tariffs on many Chinese goods, intensifying a trade war that threatens to batter global energy demand.】

item.title: 关税的作用：谁来支付、谁来征收以及关税为何会提高价格
item.description: 随着美国关税的激增开始重新定义美国的贸易关系，美国消费者正在接受一堂关于进口税如何运作的速成课程。以下是基本知识。【原文：As radical increases in US tariffs begin to redefine the country’s trading relationships, American consumers are getting a crash course in how taxes on imports work. Here are the basics.】
